summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 4550, entitled "An Ordinance to license and regulate circuses, side-shows, dogs shows, skating rinks, operas, concerts, theaters, shows, exhibitions and other places of public amusements, and to provide penalties for the violation of its provisions, and repealing Ordinance No. 3375", approved July 6, 1897, and Ordinance No. 4915, approved May 20, 1898, amendatory thereof.
